person.persName: Abner Lewis (Harlan County farmer and soldier)

body.p: Harlan County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Lewis. Father of John Lewis, Charlotte Lewis, Alexander Lewis, Elizabeth Lewis, Thomas J. Lewis, Elijah Lewis, Cynthia Lewis, Martha Lewis, Nancy Lewis, and Rebecca Lewis. Farmer in Harlan County, Kentucky, in 1860. First lieutenant in the Harlan County Battalion of Kentucky State Militia from October 1862 to January 1863.
